typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Orders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderDetails
DerivedColumn2, OrderDetails join(Orders@OrderID == OrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Join derive(OrderDate = toTimestamp(OrderDate),
		ShipDate = toTimestamp(ShipDate),
		TotalCost = toDecimal(TotalCost),
		OrderCreatedDate = toTimestamp(Orders@CreatedDate),
		OrderUpdatedDate = toTimestamp(Orders@UpdatedDate),
		Quantity = toInteger(Quantity),
		UnitCost = toDecimal(UnitCost),
		LineNumber = toInteger(LineNumber),
		OrderDetailCreatedDate = toTimestamp(OrderDetails@CreatedDate),
		OrderDetailUpdatedDate = toTimestamp(OrderDetails@UpdatedDate),
		SourceSystemOrderID = Orders@OrderID,
		SourceSystemID = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		GlobalOrderID,
		SourceSystemID,
		SourceSystemOrderID = Orders@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderCreatedDate,
		OrderUpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrderDetailCreatedDate,
		OrderDetailUpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Orders derive(GlobalOrderID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumn2
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesOrders.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
